name: Mad Dawg
description: Mad Dog is a hybrid strain that delivers euphoric relaxation and a subtle, uplifting jolt of cerebral energy. It has an earthy pine aroma with sweet, minty undertones.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Uplifted, Sleepy, Hungry, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Headaches, Depression, Headache, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Anxious
